body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarDeals Inc. My name is Juan Washington. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Dorothy Butler.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Dorothy. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling happy today! I am interested in knowing more about your inventory.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great to hear! Before we proceed, may I kindly request your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide me with your current location address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My address is two zero zero Elm Street, Springfield.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Dorothy. I will now proceed to assist you with our inventory. Is there a specific type of vehicle you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for a reliable SUV. Do you have any recommendations?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Certainly! Let me check our inventory for available SUVs that meet your requirements. Thank you for your time, Dorothy. Feel free to ask any further questions you may have.
